Description:
Welcome to Cameras! A game-mode that will set your camera around the map instead of behind your car!


Gameplay:
There are 9 cameras placed around the standard rocket league map. The game will start with a birds-eye-view and then rotate through the other views. At the beginning of every kickoff it resets at birds-eye view. In other words it's a set rotation, because it plays better this way. If someone gets demoed, their camera will be normal until the next cycle so be careful where you're going! 


Mutators: It's a standard map with working boost pads, but without unlimited boost it becomes 100x harder
Turn off Shadows in Video Settings, I will have it fixed for the next maps
- Unlimited Boost



GLHF!
